```{r include=FALSE} 
knitr::opts_chunk$set(options(scipen = 999))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

> If the pizza shop of Example 2.20 decides to always put onions and mushrooms on its pizzas, how many different varieties can the shop now offer?

That leaves 7 optional toppings for the total of $2^7 = `r n <- 2^7; n`$ different varieties of pizza.
